nodes.text: ChemFlex Labs was a laboratory of ChemFlex located on Nar Shaddaa. During the Cold War, the Empire persuaded Xenobi to attack and sabotage the Labs; however, the Xenobi thugs released biotoxins that ChemFlex was studying, and they were infected along with the lab animals. The infected were wiped out by Republic forces in order to prevent the spread of the viruses.
ChemFlex Labs appears as an area on Nar Shaddaa in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
